message:
Breaking News: কুমিল্লার চৌদ্দগ্রামের গুনবতী ইউনিয়ন

Dhaka poribohon shomitir shovapoti Baccu Alkora theke tar posha kuttagulo Gunabatite leliye diyeche.Rab o policer shohayotay tara kortam gram londo-vondo kore dicche,pray shobgulo barite vangchur korche.2 ti bari jaliye di yeche.Amader pray 44 jon vai ahoto,2joner obostha ashonkajonok. tader treatment korate dicche na kuttalig.Sob rastay pahara boshiyeche kuttalig .ekhono vangchur o ogni shongjog cholche.
